task.title: Break Links
task.shortdesc: Select Break links option in Links dialog box, OLE objects in ZWCAD drawing will not be removed rather than its links. Thus, the OLEobject never updates when changing its source.

context.p: To link a file to a ZWCAD drawing

step.cmd: Save the original file. Because a linkconsists of a reference to the original file, you must save the file before you canlink to it.
In the original file, select the data youwant in the ZWCAD drawing.
Choose that program's command to place data on the Clipboard. Usually, you choose Edit > Copy from the mainmenu.
Display the ZWCAD drawing to whichyou want to link the file.
In ZWCAD, choose Edit > Paste Special from the main menu.
In the Paste Special dialog box, select Paste Link.
